name: Crownless Crown
title: Endless Wait: Crownless Crown
desc: "And with those things bearing his name, she walked into the dark night, never to return."
in_play_description: After you trigger Burning: The opponent's current active character will receive +1 DMG the next time they take DMG. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
After you trigger Burning: The opponent's current active character will receive +1 DMG the next time they take DMG. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
